steps.description: Place-Place 8-inch flour tortilla on cutting board
Spread-Spread jelly over the nut butter
steps.modified_description: Spread-Spread jelly and did not cover the full surface

errors.description: did not spread the jelly fully over tortilla

steps.description: scoop-Use the knife to scoop jelly from the jar
steps.modified_description: scoop-Use the spoon instead of knife to scoop jelly from the jar

steps.description: Clean-Clean the knife by wiping with a paper towel
scoop-Use a butter knife to scoop nut butter from the jar
steps.modified_description: scoop-Use a spoon instead of butter knife to scoop nut butter from the jar

errors.description: use spoon instead of butter knife

steps.description: Spread-Spread nut butter onto the tortilla, leaving 1/2-inch uncovered at the edges
steps.modified_description: Spread-Spread nut butter around the jelly, leaving 1/2-inch uncovered at the edges

steps.description: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to the other into a log shape, about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it tight enough to prevent gaps, but not so tight that the filling leaks
steps.modified_description: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to the other into a log shape, about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it tight enough to prevent gaps and filling leaked mistakenly while rolling

steps.description: Slide-Slide floss under the tortilla, perpendicular to the length of the roll
Place-Place the floss halfway between toothpicks
Cross-Cross the floss's two ends over the tortilla roll's top
Trim-Trim the ends of the tortilla roll with the butter knife, leaving 1/2 inch margin between the last toothpick and the end of the roll
steps.modified_description: Trim-Trim the ends of the tortilla roll with the spoon or hand instead of butter knife, leaving 1/2 inch margin between the last toothpick and the end of the roll

errors.description: use spoon and fingers of hand instead of butter knife to trim

steps.description: Secure-Secure the rolled tortilla by inserting 5 toothpicks about 1 inch apart
Clean-Clean the knife by wiping it with a paper towel
pull-pull the floss ends in opposite directions to slice
slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
Place-Place the pinwheels on a plate
steps.modified_description: Place-Place the pinwheels in a cup instead of a plate

errors.description: use a cup instead of a plate
